name: Hyeonjun Kim
body:
###Profile B.S. in Computer Science from PNU(Pusan National University)
Exchange student experience from State University of New York Oswego
Private language institute experience from Oxford,UK
###Links

Baekjoon : bright2013
###Interests Current Computer Algorithm, Embedded system(IoT), Deep learning, C++14, Functional Paradigm Old Android development, Discrete Mathematics, JavaScript, Computer Security ###Skills Programming: C, C++, Java, node.js, PHP Human Languages: English-Advanced, Korean -Native ###Development Experience Game development : RPG game with (libgdx + overlap 2d) with raftorres(라파엘깃아이디). 소프트웨어 설개 명세부터 ... Concurrent programming : Registration system - Multi-threading, Java Concurrent Queue, and testing. Embedded programming(IoT) : Robot pet with some emotions (Cortex M3 + microC OS -3 ) Clocks emitting perfume - (Arduino, Android) Graduation project : ###Campus Activities "Coala(Code + Algorithm + Life) Movement" - Programming Club on Campus "JigumHoe(지검회)" - Kendo club on Campus ###Work Experience Software Engineer, developing simulation program (TSP) with department of industrial engineering by prof.Kaphwan Kim ###Awards LINC... .... ###Research Experience ###Publications ###ETC
